p: For large-scale antibody expression, pCDNA3.4 plasmids containing genes corresponding to antibody heavy- and light-chains were co-transfected at a 1:1 ratio into Expi293F mammalian suspension cells following the manufacturer’s instructions (Thermo Fisher, Waltham, MA, USA). Antibody supernatants were harvested four days after transfection and purified via protein A affinity chromatography according to the manufacturer’s protocol (GE Healthcare, Chicago, IL, USA).
